about_the_game:
Take special package for reinforcement!

Included

  • All-in-one Material 20EA : Special material that can be used on reinforcement.
  • Reinforcement Lubricant 20EA : Increase reinforcement chance by 3 times.
detailed_description:
Take special package for reinforcement!

Included

  • Reinforcement Lubricant 20EA : Increase reinforcement chance by 3 times.
name: Metal Reaper Online - Special Reinforce Package

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows XP
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT240
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT440
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
